ch.grengine.code.groovy

Class DefaultGroovyCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.grengine.code.groovy.DefaultGroovyCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Compiler

    public class DefaultGroovyCompiler
extends Object
implements Compiler
    Default Groovy compiler.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alain Stalder, Made in Switzerland.

    • Method Detail

      • withGrape

        public static org.codehaus.groovy.control.CompilerConfiguration withGrape(org.codehaus.groovy.control.CompilerConfiguration config,
                                                                          groovy.lang.GroovyClassLoader runtimeLoader)
        modifies the given compiler configuration for Grape support in this compiler.

        Only has an effect during compilation if Grape support had been enabled and only with this compiler class.

        Parameters:
        config - compiler configuration to enable for Grape
        runtimeLoader - the GroovyClassLoader that is intended to be used later as a parent loader when loading classes compiled with the given compiler configuration
        Returns:
        modified compiler configuration, same instance as argument
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the compiler configuration is null
        Since:
        1.2

      • enableGrapeSupport

        public static void enableGrapeSupport()
        enable Grape support with the Grape class as lock.

        Currently wraps the GrapeEngine in the Grape class with a wrapper that fixes an open Groovy issue (GROOVY-7407) using the lock and provides a mechanism needed for Grape with Grengine. See user manual under "Grengine and Grape" for more information.

        Call once before using this compiler class in combination with Grengine (equivalent to calling Grengine.Grape.activate()).

        Since:
        1.2

      • enableGrapeSupport

        public static void enableGrapeSupport(Object lock)
        enable Grape support with the given class as lock.

        Currently wraps the GrapeEngine in the Grape class with a wrapper that fixes an open Groovy issue (GROOVY-7407) using the lock and provides a mechanism needed for Grape with Grengine. See user manual under "Grengine and Grape" for more information.

        Call once before using this compiler class in combination with Grengine (equivalent to calling Grengine.Grape.activate(lock)).

        Parameters:
        lock - the lock to use
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the lock is null
        Since:
        1.2

      • disableGrapeSupport

        public static void disableGrapeSupport()
        disable Grape support.

        Currently unwraps the GrapeEngine in the Grape. See user manual under "Grengine and Grape" for more information.

        Call once when done using this compiler class in combination with Grengine (equivalent to calling Grengine.Grape.deactivate()).

        Since:
        1.2

      • compile

        public Code compile(Sources sources)
        compiles the given Groovy script sources to an instance of Code in memory.

        If CompilerConfiguration.getTargetDirectory() is not null, class files are also written to the target directory.

        Specified by:
        compile in interface Compiler
        Parameters:
        sources - sources
        Returns:
        code
        Throws:
        CompileException - if compilation failed
        NullPointerException - if sources are null
        Since:
        1.0

        protected org.codehaus.groovy.control.SourceUnit addToCompilationUnit(org.codehaus.groovy.control.CompilationUnit cu,
                                                                      Source source,
                                                                      Sources sources)
        adds the given source to the given compilation unit and returns the resulting source unit.
        Parameters:
        cu - compilation unit
        source - source
        sources - all sources, needed only if the type of source is unsupported, for the resulting CompileException
        Returns:
        source unit
        Throws:
        CompileException - if the type of source is unsupported
        Since:
        1.0
